name: swiftcart-monorepo
description: SwiftCart E-Commerce Platform - Full Stack Monorepo

scripts.build: pnpm --filter swiftcart-backend build && pnpm --filter swiftcart-frontend build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules swiftcart-backend/node_modules swiftcart-frontend/node_modules swiftcart-backend/dist swiftcart-frontend/dist .pnpm-store
scripts.test: pnpm --filter swiftcart-backend test && pnpm --filter swiftcart-frontend test
scripts.test:coverage: pnpm --filter swiftcart-backend test:coverage && pnpm --filter swiftcart-frontend test:coverage
